mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.product_id AS "product.id", a.url AS "url", a.sort AS "sort", a.status AS "status", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.position_id AS "position.id", b.name AS "position.name", a.design_id AS "design.id", a.info AS "info", a.rotation AS "rotation", a.scale AS "scale", a.name AS "name"

mapper.insert: INSERT INTO os_product_image( id, product_id, url, sort, status, create_date, create_by, position_id, position_name, design_id, info, rotation, scale, name ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{product.id}, #{url}, #{sort}, #{status}, #{createDate}, #{createBy.id}, #{position.id}, #{position.name}, #{design.id}, #{info}, #{rotation}, #{scale}, #{name} )
mapper.update: UPDATE os_product_image SET product_id = #{product.id}, url = #{url}, sort = #{sort}, status = #{status}, position_id = #{position.id}, position_name = #{position.name}, design_id = #{design.id}, info = #{info}, rotation = #{rotation}, scale = #{scale}, name = #{name} WHERE id = #{id}
